Title: Security Audit & Compliance Sprint

Owner: Kilo

Description:
Run security scans, threat modelling, and produce a SOC2/GDPR gap analysis with remediation plan.

Tasks:
- Run SAST / DAST scans
- Conduct threat modeling workshop
- Produce compliance gap analysis
- Prioritize & remediate critical issues

Acceptance Criteria:
- Critical issues remediated or tracked with timelines
- Compliance gap documented

Labels: security, compliance, priority:high
